Aerial Assault.card_desc: [Advance] Advance gains a 3rd charge, standing still causes Ruckus to jet upwards.

At The Ready.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Successful hits with Rocket Launcher restore {scale=5|5} ammunition.

Countermeasure.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below 30% of your max health grants you a {scale=150|150} health shield for 4s.

Crystal Capacitor.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Reduce the Cooldown of Missile Launcher by {scale=0.7|0.7}s.

Fuel Reserves.card_desc: [Advance] Increase the distance of Advance by {scale=7|7}%

Metal March.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Gain {scale=3|3}% damage reduction for 2s after activating Missile Launcher.

Nanotechnology.card_desc: [Emitter] While Emitter is active, heal for {scale=50|50} Health each second.

No Chill.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your movement speed while firing by {scale=5|5}%

Opulence.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] Heal for {scale=100|100} health when activating Missile Launcher.

Proximity.card_desc: [Advance] Activating Advance grants {scale=3|3}% damage reduction for 3s.

Quick Loader.card_desc: [Weapon] Eliminations increase your reload speed by {scale=7|7}% for 5s.

Refraction.card_desc: [Emitter] Reduce the Cooldown of Emitter by {scale=1|1}s.

Regenerative Alloy.card_desc: [Emitter] While Emitter is active generate {scale=5|5} ammo per second.

Rocket Barrage.card_desc: [Missile Launcher] You may hold up to 3 charges of Missile Launcher.

Warden.card_desc: [Emitter] Increases the duration of Emitter by {scale=1|1}s.
